snippet.title: The Mixologist - Trailer
snippet.description:
Ready, set, mix! The Mixologist is an immersive VR bartending game where you'll craft cocktails and serve a diverse array of customers. Forget the strict simulations, this arcade-style experience lets you pour with flair as you follow real-life recipes. Earn points by serving drinks quickly and performing flair bartending tricks. Play through a dynamic solo career or team up with friends in co-op mode to speed up your progress and become the ultimate mixologist!

Wishlist now on:
https://www.meta.com/en-us/experiences/7651017371626368
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3160660/The_Mixologist/

Follow us on:
X: https://x.com/MixologistGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/themixologistgame/
Facebook: https://web.facebook.com/people/The-Mixologist/61563691448283/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@themixologistgame

You can also join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/qtJvpBj3sQ

#virtualreality #vr #metaquest2 #steamvr #bartender #cocktail
